scripts.test: npm run test:jest:frontend && npm run test:jest:backend && npm run test:chai && npm run test:playwright && npm run test:cucumberjs
scripts.cleanup:full: find . -type d \( -name 'node_modules' -o -name '.next' -o -name 'out' -o -name 'dist' -o -name 'test-results' \) -exec rm -rf {} + && echo 'Full cleanup completed!'
scripts.cleanup:build: find . -type d \( -name '.next' -o -name 'out' -o -name 'dist' -o -name 'test-results' \) -exec rm -rf {} + && echo 'Build cleanup completed!'
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup:full && npm run cleanup:npm
scripts.docker-build: docker build -t adamtestbed/codeblox-dev -f .docker/Dockerfile-dev . && docker build -t adamtestbed/codeblox-postgres -f .docker/Dockerfile-postgres . && docker build -t adamtestbed/codeblox-prod -f .docker/Dockerfile .
scripts.docker-push: docker push adamtestbed/codeblox-dev && docker push adamtestbed/codeblox-postgres && docker push adamtestbed/codeblox-prod
